00033 #define KVSO_DECLARE_OBJECT(__className) \
00034         __className(KviKvsObjectClass * pClass,KviKvsObject * pParent,const QString &szName); \
00035         ~__className(); \
00036         static void registerSelf(); \
00037         static void unregisterSelf();
00038 
00039 #define SET_OBJECT(__className) \
00040         __className *obj=new __className(parentScriptWidget()); \
00041         obj->setObjectName(getName()); \
00042         setObject(obj,true);
00043 
00044 #define KVSO_REGISTER_HANDLER(__className,__szName,__proc) \
00045         g_pKvs##__className##Class->registerFunctionHandler(__szName,(KviKvsObjectFunctionHandlerProc)(KVI_PTR2MEMBER(__className::__proc)));
00046 
00047 // TEST
00048 #define KVSO_REGISTER_HANDLER_BY_NAME(__className,__szName) \
00049 g_pKvs##__className##Class->registerFunctionHandler(#__szName,(KviKvsObjectFunctionHandlerProc)(KVI_PTR2MEMBER(__className::__szName)));
00050 
00051 #define KVSO_REGISTER_STANDARD_NOTHINGRETURN_HANDLER(__className,__szName) \
00052         g_pKvs##__className##Class->registerStandardNothingReturnFunctionHandler(__szName);
00053 
00054 #define KVSO_REGISTER_STANDARD_TRUERETURN_HANDLER(__className,__szName) \
00055         g_pKvs##__className##Class->registerStandardTrueReturnFunctionHandler(__szName);
00056 
00057 #define KVSO_REGISTER_STANDARD_FALSERETURN_HANDLER(__className,__szName) \
00058         g_pKvs##__className##Class->registerStandardFalseReturnFunctionHandler(__szName);
00059 
00060 #define KVSO_BEGIN_REGISTERCLASS(__className,__stringName,__baseClass) \
00061         static KviKvsObjectClass * g_pKvs##__className##Class = 0; \
00062         static KviKvsObject * kvs_##__className##_createInstance(KviKvsObjectClass * pClass,KviKvsObject * pParent,const QString &szName) \
00063         { \
00064                 return new __className(pClass,pParent,szName); \
00065         } \
00066         void __className::unregisterSelf() \
00067         { \
00068                 delete g_pKvs##__className##Class; \
00069                 g_pKvs##__className##Class = 0; \
00070         } \
00071         void __className::registerSelf() \
00072         { \
00073                 KviKvsObjectClass * base = KviKvsKernel::instance()->objectController()->lookupClass(__baseClass); \
00074                 g_pKvs##__className##Class = new KviKvsObjectClass(base,__stringName,kvs_##__className##_createInstance,true);
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078 #define KVSO_END_REGISTERCLASS(__className) \
00079         }
00080

00082 #define KVSO_BEGIN_CONSTRUCTOR(__className,__baseClass) \
00083         __className::__className(KviKvsObjectClass * pClass,KviKvsObject * pParent,const QString &szName) \
00084         : __baseClass(pClass,pParent,szName) \
00085         {
00086 
00087 #define KVSO_END_CONSTRUCTOR(__className) \
00088         }
00089 
00090 #define KVSO_BEGIN_DESTRUCTOR(__className) \
00091         __className::~__className() \
00092         {
00093 
00094 
00095 #define KVSO_END_DESTRUCTOR(__className) \
00096         }

00098 #define KVSO_CLASS_FUNCTION(__className,__functionName)\
00099         bool KvsObject_##__className::__functionName(KviKvsObjectFunctionCall * c)
00100 
00101 #define CHECK_INTERNAL_POINTER(__pointer)\
00102         if(!__pointer) \
00103         { \
00104                 c->error(__tr2qs_ctx("Internal error: no valid pointer for this object","objects")); \
00105                 return false; \
00106         }
00107 #define CHECK_HOBJECT_IS_WIDGET(__pObject)\
00108 if (!__pObject)\
00109         {\
00110                 c->warning(__tr2qs_ctx("Widget parameter is not an object","objects"));\
00111                 return true;\
00112         }\
00113         if (!__pObject->object())\
00114         {\
00115                 c->warning(__tr2qs_ctx("Widget parameter is not a valid object","objects"));\
00116                 return true;\
00117         }\
00118         if(!__pObject->object()->isWidgetType())\
00119         {\
00120                 c->warning(__tr2qs_ctx("Widget object required","objects"));\
00121                 return true;\
00122         }
00123 #endif
